message: anyone knows a good tool/extension to test user agents? What i wanna do is test the website in different user agents.

data.message:
IE10 (maybe 9) dev toolbar: Tools -> Change user agent string

Chrome (tested in 26.0.1386.0 dev) dev toolbar -> Settings icon in bottom right -> Overrides left menu) -> User Agent

Thanks man. I also found this: https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/user-agent-changer/?src=ss and a huge list for browser agents to be imported in the addon http://techpatterns.com/forums/about304.html
